title: @Riot, I want to talk about draft pick for real
body:
Delete blind pick ffs, I don't know any person that wants it and the server population will move to draft.

There will be some hard adjusters but they will be few

you talked about new players.

let bot players keep it to help solve the new player issue

I don't want to fill every game for 6 days running pls kappa, I want to practice my main

replies.body:
they're not gonna get rid of blind pick.
ever.
and if you want to play your main either que with friends, play TB, or play ranked.
not riots fault you're too retarded to solve a problem.

dude its blind pick you can be who you want where you want the meta doesnt really apply to normals because normals isnt played to a more serious standard as ranked just go vayne top or vayne mid mute the team and practice playing (adc for example)

> [{quoted}](name=IhakaNZ,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=YgwFEh9T,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-09-19T06:31:27.041+0000)
>
> dude its blind pick you can be who you want where you want the meta doesnt really apply to normals because normals isnt played to a more serious standard as ranked just go vayne top or vayne mid mute the team and practice playing (adc for example)

If I were to play vayne mid as per your example it would not be the same as playing her as an adc botlane where I have a support and two non bursty enemies to contend with

Just because the mode will change does not miraculously change the the league community, you are still going to have to fill 6 games in a row. 

The main problem with this suggestion is Draft Pick mode requires a player to OWN 16 champions in order to play, hence the level requirement of 25. This requirement alone is enough justification to retain blind pick.

Not allowing new players to test their mettle against other players is going to alienate them even further with even longer grinding required for level 25 via bots on top of the feeling of drowning they get once opened up to a player vs player queue.

Personally I think the current selection is fine. I prefer not to have to wait 5 minutes in lobby each game I start and would also prefer too have an unrestricted champion pool. Additionally draft pick adds an aura of seriousness to the game that casual gamers like myself don't appreciate.
We should atleast have Draft Pick Weekends or something.
